meta_title: Why CMMS Fails to Reduce Downtime: The Strategic Root Causes
meta_description: A CMMS is a system of record, not a diagnostic tool. It fails to reduce downtime due to poor data integrity, reactive backlogs, and ineffective PM schedules.
title: The CMMS Paradox: Why Your Software is a Record of Failure, Not a Tool for Success

image_prompt: A high-resolution photo of a maintenance manager in a modern factory setting, looking frustrated while staring at a tablet showing a complex CMMS dashboard with many red "Overdue" alerts. In the background, a large industrial production line is stopped, and technicians in PPE are working on a machine. The lighting is realistic, emphasizing the contrast between the digital data on the screen and the physical reality of the machine breakdown.
